remarks: Principle of Finite Induction on positive integers.  (Contributed by NM, 23-Mar-1996.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
indpi.1 $e |- ( x = 1o -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
indpi.2 $e |- ( x = y -> ( ph <-> ch ) ) $.
indpi.3 $e |- ( x = ( y +N 1o ) -> ( ph <-> th ) ) $.
indpi.4 $e |- ( x = A -> ( ph <-> ta ) ) $.
indpi.5 $e |- ps $.
indpi.6 $e |- ( y e. N. -> ( ch -> th ) ) $.
indpi $p |- ( A e. N. -> ta ) $.
$d A x $.
$d ch x $.
$d ph y $.
$d ps x $.
$d ta x $.
$d th x $.
$d x y $.
